name: tumblr - Hogwart's dashboard selector (Classic)
description: NOTE: As of 01.01.2013 this style will no longer be supported. Turns the ordinary dashboard arrow selector into the Hogwartâ€™s Crest.
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);@-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.tumblr.com'),url-prefix('https://www.tumblr.com'){#user_channels LI[class="tab selected"] A SPAN,#default_tabs LI[class="tab selected"] A SPAN,.tab.iconic.selected{background-image:url("data:image/png;base64,")!important;background-repeat:no-repeat!important;background-position:0 23px!important;padding-top:50px!important;padding-bottom:50px!important}.tab.iconic.selected{width:98px!important;padding-bottom:10px!important;margin-top:-50px!important;background-position:12px 33px!important;-moz-transform:scale(.95)!important;-webkit-transform:scale(.95)!important}#user_channels LI[class="tab selected"] A SPAN,#default_tabs LI[class="tab selected"] A SPAN{content:""!important;color:rgba(0,0,0,0)!important}A[class="selected"][href="/new/blog"],A[class="selected"][title="Inbox"][href="/inbox"],A[class="selected"][title="Help"][href="/help"],A[class="selected"][title="Preferences"][href="https://www.tumblr.com/preferences"]{opacity:0!important}#inbox_button.tab.iconic.selected .selection_nipple:not([class="selection_nipple white"]){padding-bottom:15px!important}.selection_nipple.white,.selection_nipple:not([class="selection_nipple white"]){visibility:hidden!important}}
